about_the_game:
Farm RPG is a menu based farming RPG/MMO. Build your farm, grow crops, fish, craft, and explore. Unlock a variety of exciting daily activities as you progress. Engage with helpful townsfolk and collaborate with fellow players in a vibrant community for trading and teamwork.

Features:
- Farming, Fishing, Crafting, Exploring, Trading & Cooking
- No limit to playing, farm all day if you want!
- Mostly menu-based to reduce data usage and plays fast
- No ads or annoying popups, 100% ad-free
- Help Requests from NPCs give you plenty to do
- Item Mastery for long-term goals
- Chickens, Cows, Steak Market, Pets and more
- Solid community of friendly gamers

Farm RPG is a game about choice and making money. There are many ways to invest and grow your farm to increase your profits. The community loves to help players in terms of how to play, best things to do first, and more.

Come join us and enjoy a chill, relaxed farming game with a simple UI and tons of RPG elements. The game is non-competitive and includes one of the friendliest communities you'll ever see. The game is played online with other players and requires a network connection.

Registration is easy and NO data is collected or sold. You can include your email when you join, but it is optional and only used for password recovery. Farm RPG is playable cross-platform and on mobile devices. Your progress is synced between devices as well.

Easy to pick up and hard to put down!
